duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure the hotel’s maintenance and upkeep standards meet WL, Brand, and Guest standards.
Support Chief Engineer in overseeing and supervising all aspects of the Engineering function of the hotel.
Proactively follow specific departmental procedures in performing repair, maintenance, alteration, and installation work in a safe and neat manner.
Provide advice and support other engineers as needed or requested.
Responsible for identifying and repairing all mechanical failure to include repair of appliances, HVAC, electrical or plumbing.
Maintain communications with supervisors to ensure all needed materials, tools, and supplies are available or on order.
Read and interpret blueprints, specifications, and operating instructions.
Carry out safety and security work practices.
Lift, carry or otherwise move up to 10 lbs. regularly and 25 lbs. occasionally, as well as the ability to stand and move for long periods of time.
Oversee online presence and actively participate in promoting freight and logistics services.
Lead a team of maintenance technicians and provide guidance to achieve set maintenance goals.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine maintenance strategies.
Manage trade shows and events for promoting hotel engineering services.
Measure and report on the performance of maintenance procedures, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: One year trade school or equivalent
